description: This looked great and uncluttered, was exactly what I was looking for, but program would not load on my Ubuntu 22:04. Very disappointed.

Very interesting app.  Most mindmapping tools are much more complex and cumbersome (heavy).  Once you play with this and see how to structure the map and move data blocks around, it becomes a fast method to structure info of many kinds.  

Export to PNG solves the printing requirement too. Love the arrow notes (adds logic flow chart capability).

 On the down side, there is no capability to add links or graphic data so this limits the program (compared to FreeMind or FreePlane).  

But still, you can do all kinds of useful system and logic maps, procedures & stepwise instructions.
summary: Creative design and easy to use

description: App does exactly what it is supposed to do. I find it useful and fun.
That being said I found it a bit too simplistic. Very limiting.
summary: It's very basic and great for something very simple

description: Exactly what I was looking for: fast, responsive, without unnecessary things!
If you need just simplest mind map tool with just enough functionalities for your linux environment, then this tool is for you

I was looking for a mind mapping tool to map out all my devices and cloud services. Heimer is very straight-forward, visually clear, simple, not clunky or messy. The interface is intuitive and makes good use of colour. The makers have thought the node connection system through very well, with options of arrows in one direction, in both, or just lines, or no lines between nodes.

Points for improvement: there should be an option that any node dragged from a node with the colour blue, for example, automatically because blue.

Sometimes mouse-clicking is fiddly. You can quite easily create a new node or new connection without meaning to.
I've tested a few mind maps and this was the easiest to use and with the best layout.
Just to Start Working
I've been looking for an alternative to Scapple, this fits the bill perfectly. Many mind mapping programs are complex and bulky, this, like scapple, is very fast, simple and snappy.

features i actually miss:
- changing arrow direction
- attaching boxes that aren't connected
- attaching boxes after deletion of "middlebox"
it's good and easy to use to do some normal things, however it should be developed more.
Heimer is straight foward, simple and easy to use. If you want something more stylish use another one like minder.
Thats a cool software app. Thank You .
Easy to use, more features would be amazing.
good maind maip tool
Heimer is so easy to use and has enough features to quickly create well organised charts with colour coded boxes. Intuitive design.

Intuitiv bedienbar, was gut ist. Es lassen sich leider nur einfache Mindmaps damit erstellen. Die Funktion, selbst Pfeile zu erstellen, fehlt. Somit lassen sich komplexere Zusammenhänge nicht darstellen.
Qué pasa con el programa que no me deja guardar o guardar como?
Solo falta que al eliminar un nodo, se eliminen los hijos. o si cambia el color de un nodo, pedir cambiar el color de los hijos
Это даже не запустилось
